## ูุตุจ

```bash
pip install marketclock
```

ุง ุงฺฏุฑ ููฺฉุงู ุชูุณุนู ูโุฏูุฏ:

```bash

cd marketclock
pip install -e .
```

## ุงุณุชูุงุฏู

```python
from marketclock import MarketClock

mc = MarketClock(alpha_api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")
res = mc.get_open_markets_json()
print(res)
```
